original_title: Annie Moses Band - The Art Of The Love Song
overview: The Art of the Love Song is a lush, romantic album that follows their first Warner Classics release, American Rhapsody. It was recorded live in July 2015 at the legendary Grand Ole Opry House.  The Art of the Love Song was conceived as a special braodcast for PBS and it will be one of the featured programs during PBS's March 2016 pledge drive, reaching an audience of several million.  The concert features 14 songs  Songs made famous by Barbra Streisand, The Beatles, Art Garfunkle, Joe Cocker and Perry Como.
title: Annie Moses Band - The Art Of The Love Song (2015)
